title: Action
description: Schema for a single action button configuration

label.description: Human-readable label for the action button.

icon.description: Name of the Lucide icon component (e.g., 'LucideCamera', 'LucidePackage').

run.description: Command to execute when the action is triggered (e.g., 'pnpm capture:emptystate:ps').

group.description: Category or group for the action, used for UI clustering.
